email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. Her DWT is 150,000, and LOA is 280 meters. The starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per metric ton, which is a significant reduction from the initial quote. The laycan is October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.75 is more in line with our expectations. We can proceed with this rate, provided the laycan remains firm. Could you also confirm the demurrage terms? Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the rate works for you. The laycan is confirmed for October 20-25. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. I’ll draft the charter party agreement and send it over for your review. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good on our end. Please go ahead and send over the charter party agreement. We’ll review it and get back to you shortly. Thanks for your help in finalizing this deal. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve attached the charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if you have any questions or need further adjustments. Looking forward to wrapping this up. Best, Sarah
